LanguageData.EM_Prolactin_Tolerance.description: Developing tolerance to Prolactin. Reduces drug effect and increases daily lactation severity decay.
LanguageData.EM_Prolactin_Tolerance.stages.0.label: small tolerance
LanguageData.EM_Prolactin_Tolerance.stages.1.label: moderate tolerance
LanguageData.EM_Prolactin_Tolerance.stages.2.label: high tolerance
LanguageData.EM_Prolactin_High.description: Short-term euphoria from Prolactin; slight impairment to coordination and awareness.
LanguageData.EM_Prolactin_Addiction.description: Addicted to Prolactin. Must satisfy need regularly or lactation severity will decay; when satisfied, severity does not decay.
LanguageData.EM_Prolactin_Addiction.stages.0.label: satisfied
LanguageData.EM_Prolactin_Addiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
